words.source: H5414 (נתן), HC/Vqq1cs (conjunctive/Qal-perfect-1cs, sequential future). KJV 'And I will give', ESV 'And I will give', NASB 'I will grant'.
H853 (אֵת), HTo (direct object marker). Untranslated in English.
H5971 (עַם), HTd/Ncmsa (article/noun-common-ms-absolute). KJV 'this people', ESV 'this people', NASB 'this people'.
H2088 (זֶה), HTd/Pdxms (article/demonstrative-ms). KJV 'this', ESV 'this', NASB 'this'. All agree.
H5869 (עַיִן), HR/Ncbdc (preposition-beth/noun-common-both-dual-construct). KJV 'in the sight of', ESV 'in the sight of', NASB 'in the sight of'.
H4713 (מִצְרַיִם), HNp (proper noun). KJV 'the Egyptians', ESV 'the Egyptians', NASB 'the Egyptians'. Used here for the people of Egypt.
H1961 (היה), HC/Vqq3ms (conjunctive/Qal-perfect-3ms, sequential future). KJV 'and it shall come to pass', ESV 'and', NASB 'so it will be'.
H3588 (כִּי), HC (conjunction). KJV 'that, when', ESV 'when', NASB 'that when'.
H3212 (הלך), HVqi2mp/Sn (Qal-imperfect-2mp/paragogic-nun). KJV 'ye go', ESV 'you go', NASB 'you go'.
H3808 (לֹא), HTn (negative particle). KJV 'not', ESV 'not', NASB 'not'. All agree.
H3212 (הלך), HVqi2mp (Qal-imperfect-2mp). KJV 'ye shall not go', ESV 'you shall not go', NASB 'you will not go'.
